name: SarahMichelGérard
description:
Video game made during the #jamnuitblanche at the CRI Paris.

The game is about empathy, on a comedy/horror narrative game.

Your goal is to escape the building alive !

A game by : Marion Audebert, Baptiste Bourron, Maximilien Glineur, David Pedro, Clément Schepens and Denis Tribouillois.
